mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (MEMBER_ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBLIC_DATE, TOTAL_PAGE, IMAGE_FILE, RESOURCE_FROM) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{publicDate}, #{totalPage}, #{imageFile}, #{resourceFrom})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET TOTAL_PAGE = #{totalPage}, TITLE = #{title}, AUTHOR = #{author}, PUBLISHER = #{publisher}, IMAGE_FILE = #{imageFile}, RESOURCE_FROM = #{resourceFrom}, PUBLIC_DATE = #{publicDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM VW_BOOK_CATEGORY_LIST WHERE AUTHOR LIKE '%${author}%'
